attributes.action: make football referees publicly explain their decisions within 30 minutes of the end of the match
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As referees now seem to be able to give any decision they like during the course of a football match they should be made accountable for those decisions. I believe the referees should give reasons for the decisions they have made which can cost football clubs league points or cup wins and creates tension in the crowd to the public with 30 minutes of the end of the match. Supporters then may respect match officials more that they currently seem to.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
